text: Gregorio Martínez Sacristán' (19 December 1946 - 20 September 2019) was a Spanish Roman Catholic bishop. Martínez Sacristán was ordained to the priesthood in 1971. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Zamora in Spain from 2006 until his death in 2019.Diocese of Zamora Martínez Sacristán died on 20 September 2019 in Madrid at the age of 72.Fallece el obispo de Zamora, Gregorio Martínez Sacristán ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Madrid
title: Gregorio Martínez Sacristán
